paragraphs.content: Lift up your heads, O ye generations of Jacob; and be ye lifted up; and the Lord strong and mighty; the Lord mighty in battle, who is the king of glory, shall establish you forever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lift up your heads, O ye generations of Jacob; and be ye lifted up; and the Lord strong and mighty; the Lord mighty in battle, who is the king of glory, shall establish you forever.

paragraphs.content: And he will roll away the heavens; and will come down to redeem his people; to make you an everlasting name; to establish you upon his everlasting rock.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he will roll away the heavens; and will come down to redeem his people; to make you an everlasting name; to establish you upon his everlasting rock.

paragraphs.content: Lift up your heads, O ye generations of Jacob; lift up your heads, ye everlasting generations, and the Lord of hosts, the king of kings;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lift up your heads, O ye generations of Jacob; lift up your heads, ye everlasting generations, and the Lord of hosts, the king of kings;

paragraphs.content: Even the king of glory shall come unto you; and shall redeem his people, and shall establish them in righteousness. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Even the king of glory shall come unto you; and shall redeem his people, and shall establish them in righteousness. Selah.
